song.title: Ravium
song.info: Info from the S3M file: ----------------------------------------- Mad Max/Dementia presents RAViUM 6 minutes of real rave Play Stereo in Cubic! Length: 6 Minutes! Speed: 178 babes per minute Hi i'm back again after two months vacation! Here's a great ravetrack ! And it's huge! I've put some little panning-fx in there...So play in stereo for the best quality! The song is in the style of Westbam/Rmb/Ravers Nature...REAL rave... I think it roels more than the ravestyle of Lameparade or Paulus Elstakker...Ha! Well eh...Tot Sinas! greets & respect ThunderbassArmadonIceman CharonPhoncHereticChilm SkullRazorSonicAtreides CalimeroJayNeophite4Ice MorphineSplinterDynamix Pope-XWolf from Frysia (Thanx pal!) and ofcoz YOU! I know...It's big! But hey lotsa great tunes, so listen it all the way! "Arrogance pollutes your music..." What the fuck do you think you're doin here you idiot? Get yar ass upthere!
